titles.title: Medicare Respiratory Therapy Initiative Act of 2008
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for Medicare coverage of services of qualified respiratory therapists performed under the general supervision of a physician.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/5/2008--Introduced. Medicare Respiratory Therapy Initiative Act of 2008 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover the services of a qualified respiratory therapist performed under the general supervision of a physician.
